data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
After the previous discussion (last month) about Library::..., it
    seems that many people agree on using Biblio::... for tools for
    libraries (digital or not). While I could use Thesaurus::... to put
    the module in, it would be isolated from upcomming modules on
    Biblio::*

    Alberto Simões
